caption:
It's never too late to go after your dreams. 🥺 Just last week, 80-year-old Linwood Riddick graduated from HBCU South Carolina State University with a BA in Music. #BlackExcellence⁠
⁠
Mr. Riddick put his college education on hold to serve in the military and at that time segregation also present challenges. He made a promise to himself that he would one day walk across the stage. He drove 45 minutes every day to attend classes and on May 10th, accomplished his goal. 👏🏾⁠
⁠
Follow @officialblackwallstreet for more Black excellence and Black-owned businesses. ✨️
